name: Movies Master
description:
Movies Master is one of the most addictive game of the year! Challenge yourself, try to reveal as many movies as possible from the secret covers, it's as simple as that:

• Open a secret poster
• Type the movie's title if you know it
• See immediately if you have the right answer
• Need some help? Reveal more elements of the poster

Unlock up to 5 more levels and find as many movies as you can from the hundreds of secret posters!

Movies Masters is entirely FREE for a limited time, get it while it's still time!
